items.name: emotional_variant_a
items.creative_direction: Owner + senior dog bond moment, warm home light, high contrast headline
items.primary_text: You are not late. Tracking today can protect more good days ahead.
items.headline: More good days together

items.name: evidence_variant_b
items.audience: Senior dog owners interested in longevity research
items.creative_direction: Simple chart motif + calm clinical palette, no fear tactics
items.primary_text: Daily baseline tracking helps you catch subtle changes earlier.
items.headline: Early signals matter

items.name: loy002_variant_c
items.creative_direction: Clean productless informational card with LOY-002 timeline framing
items.primary_text: LOY-002 timelines may move fast. Build your dog's baseline before approval windows shift.
items.headline: Plan before it is urgent

items.name: vet_ready_variant_d
items.audience: Owners who value practical vet prep
items.creative_direction: Checklist-style visual: appetite, mobility, sleep, stool
items.primary_text: Bring trend data to your next vet visit instead of trying to remember details.
items.headline: Walk into appointments prepared

items.name: breed_variant_e
items.creative_direction: Senior golden/lab outdoors, bold text overlay, soft teal accent
items.primary_text: Large breeds often show decline differently. Start your baseline now.
items.headline: Large breeds need earlier signals
